details.name: subject
details.old_value: "Set recommended" gfx settings doesn't force fullscreen

details.name: description
details.old_value:
The Options > Graphics > "Set Recommended Settings" button is useful to reset the gfx config to default settings.

When the game is set in fullscreen, this feature works quite well. However, when the game is in Windowed mode, the "Set Recommended Settings" will use the "desktop resolution" as default resolution, but the game will still be in windowed mode. Fullscreen should be set as default here.
details.new_value:
The Options > Graphics > "Set Recommended Settings" button is useful to reset the gfx config to default settings.

When the game is set in fullscreen, this feature works quite well. However, when the game is in Windowed mode, the "Set Recommended Settings" will use the "desktop resolution" as default resolution, but the game will still be in windowed mode. Fullscreen should be set as default here.

A similar issue exists while being in fullscreen, desktop resolution and changing settings to a lower windowed resolution. When _rejecting_ the change, the fullscreen state is not restored.

This issue doesn't seem to be a regression,  as it existed already with SDL1.

subject: Fullscreen state not restored
description:
The Options > Graphics > "Set Recommended Settings" button is useful to reset the gfx config to default settings.

When the game is set in fullscreen, this feature works quite well. However, when the game is in Windowed mode, the "Set Recommended Settings" will use the "desktop resolution" as default resolution, but the game will still be in windowed mode. Fullscreen should be set as default here.

A similar issue exists while being in fullscreen, desktop resolution and changing settings to a lower windowed resolution. When _rejecting_ the change, the fullscreen state is not restored.

This issue doesn't seem to be a regression,  as it existed already with SDL1.
